title: BS Riot, Absolute BS.
body:
So with this new client, I have continuously been disconnected, can't reconnected, can hardly play the game, and now I have been smacked with a 20 minute x 5 games of low priority queue, I have also been dealt a 6 minute dodge timer because I, "left", during champion select.
I will now troll every single one of these games and afk, because f you riot, f  you so much. Fix your stupid fing systems or I'll continue to do this, and no this isn't my main account so go ahead and ban this one you fers, you're stupidity will now be a direct cause to others misfortune.
F you so much riot.

replies.body:
It sounds like your network is having problems staying connected to the servers, so you're getting left behind.   You could get this resolved by following each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune things up, then test it out in a custom game.  I know that this has been frustrating, but laying down threats to cause a negative experience against your peers won't really solve anything.  

Keep in mind that we won't hesitate to remove players and any associated  accounts should they select to intentionally grief others.  Hopefully that clears things up!
